document.full_text: novak djokovic felt "more nervous than usual" as he faced his first serious test at the french open on saturday but continued his amazing unbeaten run by knocking out juan martin del potro to reach the fourth round.
document.title: djokovic downs del potro to go 40-0 in 2011
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic felt "more nervous than usual" as he faced his first serious test at the french open on saturday but continued his amazing unbeaten run by knocking out juan martin del potro to reach the fourth round.
